name: Pratyush Gupta
summary: I am a tech enthusiast with a passion for innovation. I'm a highly competent MERN Developer and enthusiastic web developer that specializes in Front-End and Back-End Programming as well as proficient in Python and C++ coding. My passion for data structures and algorithms drives my work, and I apply these concepts to my web development projects to produce effective and approachable solutions. I wish to contribute to the growth of the company while working in a dynamic Organization.

certifications.name: Software Defined Networking
certifications.description: The Software Defined Networking (SDN) course on Coursera covers the fundamentals of SDN, including its architecture, principles, and applications. It explores how SDN decouples network control from hardware, enabling flexible network management, optimization, and innovation. Key topics include OpenFlow, network virtualization, and security implications.
